catalog_info.title: Computer-Aided Machine Design
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: High school calculus; high school physics.
catalog_info.description: A first course in the design and construction of mechanical and electromechanical devices. Engineering graphics and sketching; dimensions and tolerances. Introduction to materials selection and structural design. Machine elements and two-dimensional mechanisms; DC motors. Design methodology. Emphasis on laboratory work and design projects using professional solid modeling CAD software and numerically controlled machine tools.
